BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.BlockRam.blockRam#
BlackBox.type:
blockRam# :: KnownNat n       -- ARG[0]
           => SClock clk       -- clk,  ARG[1]
           -> Vec n a          -- init, ARG[2]
           -> Signal' clk Int  -- rd,   ARG[3]
           -> Signal' clk Bool -- wren, ARG[4]
           -> Signal' clk Int  -- wr,   ARG[5]
           -> Signal' clk a    -- din,  ARG[6]
           -> Signal' clk a
